reviews.text: Very Large Station, Live departures available and Automated Oyster Top up stations. No seating. Very helpful staff on site

All trains cancelled? Check. Station with massive open interior spaces? Check. Very heavy hail storm outside? Check. Staff not letting paying customers in and out of the rain? No check. Inhumane station.

when train for gatwick airport is cancelled for no reason, and you have to wait 45 mn at 5 am with some weird guys aournd smoking weed and drinking and the informations point is closed so you are completely alone and no one can help you. very unpleasant experience.
Guys, just give the tannoy announcements a rest. I know how to catch a train. I don’t need multiple announcements to know where a train is going and how many coaches it is made up of.

The guy on site on the circle line platfotm for Paddington at 10:24 - 11/04/2019. was useless i asked him something, am i on the right platform and he was acting rood and even started to joke with me and i catched the wrong train cause he didn't helped me !!! Il report him to the sitizens advice !!!
